mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.`BOOK_PK_ID` AS `bookId`, p.`BOOK_NAME` AS `bookname`, p.`BOOK_YEAR` AS `year`, p.`BOOK_FK_AUTHOR_ID` AS `authorId` FROM `BOOK` AS p JOIN `AUTHOR` AS m ON (m.`AUTHOR_PK_ID` = p.`BOOK_FK_AUTHOR_ID`) WHERE m.AUTHOR_PK_ID = #{authorId}
SELECT `AUTHOR_PK_ID` AS `authorId`, `AUTHOR_NAME` AS `authorname`, `AUTHOR_EMAIL` AS `email`, `AUTHOR_ADDRESS` AS `address` FROM `AUTHOR` WHERE AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorname}
